entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 07:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Local rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
